title: Jhin...
body:
I remember the release of Jhin in 2016. He was the first champ I liked instantly when he came on the live servers. Today after several buffs and nerfs of him and other items effect him not directly, e.g. Botrk, assasin update, tank updates, i want to ask you if Jhin is viable or if you would either buff him or change him in some ways.
I thought of all his abilities:
- passive: here i think of some scaling changes like a higher attack speed and crit into AD scaling 
- Q: maybe let the fourth bounce crit when you kill 3 units/champs before, would fit into his concept
- W: bonus damage when you snare 
- E: percentage health dmg to make it more attractive, because today its only used as vision or snare possibility
- R: stack mechanic (hardcore imaginery), more dmg (like kindred) when you kill someone with the ult

I like to hear your opinions about Jhin, and those are just a few thoughts on making the Champion more unique :)
